      • getAverageLength

        public static double getAverageLength(List<Double> oh,
                                      List<Double> cl,
                                      int numPeriods)
                               throws DataException
        Parameters:
        oh - : List of open/high prices where last element is the latest data.
        cl - : List of closing/low prices where last element is the latest data.
        numPeriods: - Number of previous periods going back from the latest period to past over which the average have to be calculated.
        Returns:
        : returns the average length over the specified number of periods.
        Throws:
        DataException - if sufficient data not available.
